subject: Import fees
description_text:
Hello,
It says on my UPS tracking page that there is around 40 euros import fees
on my package. It wasn't explicitly mentioned on the simpson site that I
will have carry the burden of any additional fees so I'm a little confused.
Is it possible that its some kind of misunderstanding?

Order number: SSN5782

conversations.body_text: Hi Mikołaj Posiadała,    Please don't worry. After completing payment, provide the UPS invoice and we will reimburse you.

Hello,
I paid the fee but ups did not send me an invoice so, I'm sending the
extract from my bank, as well as the receipt from ups (the only thing i
received). I hope that's enough

Kind regards
Mikołaj Posiadała

czw., 8 sty 2026 o 10:26 service@simsonn.com
Hi Mikołaj Posiadała,    Okay, we have refunded you 20 euros as compensation.

Hello,
I wanted to thank you for refunduje me:)

On Mon, 12 Jan 2026 at 13:00, service@simsonn.com
